A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The film is riddled with poor plot\, poor writing and awful decisions at all levels of the production. Critics can't stand by what they are saying when they praise this film as the majority of fans can see how horribly the director treated their beloved characters.

My half star is for the scenes involving Luke and Rey together\, everything else didn't work for me.

I enjoyed Rogue One and The Force Awakens but this film needs to be retconned fast.
